entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
